title: India welcomes the Queen, 1961
creator_credit: British Movietone News and Commonwealth Relations Office
brief_description: H.M. the Queen’s tour of India, 1961. Episodes include the Royal arrival at Delhi, splendours of a Durbar at Jaipur, the spectacular Republic Day parade in Delhi, and visits to the Taj Mahal, Durgapur steelworks, the botanical gardens at Bangalore, and the cities of Calcutta, Madras, and the Holy city of Benares.
